Package com.example.inventorymanager

Class ImageUtility

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorymanager.ImageUtility
public class ImageUtility extends Object
This is a utility class that contains helpful methods for handling image-related operations and validations.
Author:
Kareem Assaf, David Onchuru

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleCameraIntent()
    Handles the camera intent by checking for CAMERA permission, requesting it if necessary, and launching the camera application to capture an image.
    void
    handleGalleryIntent()
    Handles the gallery intent by launching the gallery to allow the user to select from the photo gallery
    String
    saveImageLocally(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, String fileName)
    Helper method to save the image locally and return the path (where that image has been stored)
    void
    showImageOptionsDialog()
    Displays a dialog fragment for selecting image options, such as choosing from the gallery or capturing a photo

  • Method Details

    • showImageOptionsDialog

      public void showImageOptionsDialog()
      Displays a dialog fragment for selecting image options, such as choosing from the gallery or capturing a photo

    • handleCameraIntent

      public void handleCameraIntent()
      Handles the camera intent by checking for CAMERA permission, requesting it if necessary, and launching the camera application to capture an image.

    • handleGalleryIntent

      public void handleGalleryIntent()
      Handles the gallery intent by launching the gallery to allow the user to select from the photo gallery

    • saveImageLocally

      public String saveImageLocally(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, String fileName)
      Helper method to save the image locally and return the path (where that image has been stored)
      Parameters:
      bitmap - The file's bitmap
      fileName - What you want to name the file as
      Returns:
